description.fieldDescription: Will be displayed on the page and in reference components and maximum character limit is 200
description.name: ./jcr:description

metadescription.fieldDescription: Used for SEO and indexing. Keep it under 155 characters.
metadescription.name: ./metaDescription

upload.granite:title: Asset picker type
upload.fieldDescription: Image associated with the page that will be used in reference and listing components
upload.name: ./image/file.sftmp

hideinnav.fieldDescription: Hides the page from top, bottom and left navigation menus
hideinnav.name: ./hideInNav

hidefromcomponent.fieldDescription: Hides the page from the listing components
hidefromcomponent.name: ./hideFromComponent

hidebreadcrumbs.fieldDescription: Hides the breadcrumb on the page
hidebreadcrumbs.name: ./hideBreadcrumbs

navigationtitle.fieldDescription: It is referenced in Bread crumb
navigationtitle.name: ./navTitle

canonicalurl.fieldDescription: By Default, this will add the current URL of the page as the canonical URL. Enter a value to overwrite
canonicalurl.name: ./canonicalUrl

ampcanonicalurl.fieldDescription: By default it is empty and author can add a url in it
ampcanonicalurl.name: ./ampcanonicalUrl

schemamarkup.fieldDescription: Please do not add more than 5 blocks
schemamarkup.name: ./schemaMarkup

googletitle.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with page title field. Enter a value to overwrite.
googletitle.name: ./googleTitle

googledescription.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with meta description field. Enter a value to overwrite.
googledescription.name: ./googleDescription

googlelanguage.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with language field. Enter a value to overwrite.
googlelanguage.name: ./googleLanguage

googleauthor.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with 'RMIT University'. Enter a value to overwrite.
googleauthor.name: ./googleAuthor

googlecopyright.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with 'RMIT University'. Enter a value to overwrite.
googlecopyright.name: ./googleCopyright

facebookogtitle.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with page title field. Enter a value to overwrite.
facebookogtitle.name: ./facebookOgTitle

facebookogtype.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with 'article'. Enter a value to overwrite.
facebookogtype.name: ./facebookOgType

facebookogurl.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with page thumbnail image. Enter a value to overwrite.
facebookogurl.name: ./facebookOgUrl

facebookogdescription.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with meta description field. Enter a value to overwrite.
facebookogdescription.name: ./facebookOgDescription

facebookogimage.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with page thumbnail image. Enter a value to overwrite.
facebookogimage.name: ./facebookOgImage

twittercard.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with 'summary'. Enter a value to overwrite.
twittercard.name: ./twitterCard

twittertitle.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with page title field. Enter a value to overwrite.
twittertitle.name: ./twitterTitle

twitterdescription.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with meta description field. Enter a value to overwrite.
twitterdescription.name: ./twitterDescription

twitterImage.fieldDescription: By default, will be populated with meta description field. Enter a value to overwrite
twitterImage.name: ./twitterImage

thumbnail.fieldDescription: Image associated with the page that will be used in reference and listing components
thumbnail.name: ./gelImage
